Class DrawingCanvas

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              DrawingCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, SessionListener
public class DrawingCanvas
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements java.io.Serializable, SessionListener

DrawingCanvas is the actual drawing surface.

See Also:
Serialized Form
